hints.content:
The denominator in $\dfrac{13}{6}$, is $6$. 

So, there should be $6$ equal parts in each whole.



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 3 with tick marks every one-sixth unit. The tick marks at 1 and 2 are labeled. Eighteen equal rectangles labeled one-sixth are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-sixth of a whole. The seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth, eleventh, and twelfth rectangles from the left are shifted upward. !

hints.content:
The numerator in $\dfrac{13}{6}$, is $13$. 

So, there should be $13$ equal parts shaded.



[[☃ image 1]]



Which number line shows a point located at $\dfrac{13}{6}$?

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 3 with tick marks every one-sixth unit. The tick marks for one-sixth, 1, and 2 are labeled. Eighteen equal rectangles labeled one-sixth are above the number line. Each rectangle represents one-sixth of a whole. The seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth, eleventh, and twelfth rectangles from the left are shifted upward. The first 13 rectangles from the left are shaded. An arrow points right along the number line from the tick mark at 0 to the first tick mark after the 2. !

hints.content: Number line $\greenD{A}$ shows a point located is at $\dfrac{13}{6}.$

question.content:
**Which point is at $\dfrac{13}{​6}$ on the number line?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: $\greenD{A}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, five unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, five unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 2, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 3. A green dot appears at the first tick mark after 2.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/302880b74bb9119dbdc9fc1f66a9a3a7940ac239)

$\maroonD{B}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, six unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 1. A pink dot appears at the third tick mark after 0.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3ee32b6c279c027c111f1de8eb5eb5f81c677ef1)

$\blueD{C}$ ![A number line that has moving left to right, a starting tick mark at 0, five unlabeled tick marks, a tick mark labeled 1, five unlabeled tick marks, and an ending tick mark at 2. A blue dot appears at the 2 tick mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d954a853d0654651f841baf3fba560bbed5b14a6)
